00049 static struct ccn_charbuf *
00050 ccnr_init_service_ccnb(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr, struct ccn *h, const char *baseuri, int freshness)
00051 {
00052     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00053     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00054     struct ccn_charbuf *pubid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00055     struct ccn_charbuf *pubkey = ccn_charbuf_create();
00056     struct ccn_charbuf *keyid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00057     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
00058     int res;
00059     
00060     res = ccn_get_public_key(h, NULL, pubid, pubkey);
00061     if (res < 0) abort();
00062     ccn_name_from_uri(name, baseuri);
00063     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00064     ccn_charbuf_append_string(keyid, ".M.K");
00065     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, 0, 1);
00066     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(keyid, pubid);
00067     ccn_name_append(name, keyid->buf, keyid->length);
00068     ccn_create_version(h, name, 0, ccnr->starttime, ccnr->starttime_usec * 1000);
00069     sp.template_ccnb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00070     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo, CCN_DTAG);
00071     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator, CCN_DTAG);
00072     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyName, CCN_DTAG);
00073     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(sp.template_ccnb, name);
00074     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00075 //    ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
00076 //                          CCN_DTAG);
00077 //    ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(sp.template_ccnb, pubid);
00078 //    ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00079     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00080     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00081     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
00082     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%00");
00083     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
00084     sp.type = CCN_CONTENT_KEY;
00085     sp.freshness = freshness;
00086     res = ccn_sign_content(h, cob, name, &sp, pubkey->buf, pubkey->length);
00087     if (res != 0) abort();
00088     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00089     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubid);
00090     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubkey);
00091     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keyid);
00092     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&sp.template_ccnb);
00093     return(cob);
00094 }
00095 
00096 /**
00097  * Common interest handler
00098  */
00099 PUBLIC enum ccn_upcall_res
00100 ccnr_answer_req(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00101                  enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00102                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00103 {
00104     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = NULL;
00105     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00106     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator = NULL;
00107     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
00108     struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body = NULL;
00109     struct ccnr_handle *ccnr = NULL;
00110     int res = 0;
00111     int morecomps = 0;
00112     const unsigned char *final_comp = NULL;
00113     size_t final_size = 0;
00114     
00115     switch (kind) {
00116         case CCN_UPCALL_FINAL:
00117             free(selfp);
00118             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00119         case CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST:
00120             break;
00121         case CCN_UPCALL_CONSUMED_INTEREST:
00122             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00123         default:
00124             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00125     }
00126     ccnr = (struct ccnr_handle *)selfp->data;
00127     if (CCNSHOULDLOG(ccnr, LM_128, CCNL_FINE))
00128         ccnr_debug_ccnb(ccnr, __LINE__, "ccnr_answer_req", NULL,
00129                         info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00130     morecomps = selfp->intdata & MORECOMPS_MASK;
00131     if ((info->pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_NEW) == 0 &&
00132         selfp->intdata != OP_SERVICE)
00133         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00134     if (info->matched_comps >= info->interest_comps->n)
00135         goto Bail;
00136     if ((selfp->intdata & OPER_MASK) != OP_SERVICE &&
00137         info->pi->prefix_comps != info->matched_comps + morecomps)
00138         goto Bail;
00139     if (morecomps == 1) {
00140         res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps,
00141                                 info->matched_comps,
00142                                 &final_comp, &final_size);
00143         if (res < 0)
00144             goto Bail;
00145     }
00146     if ((selfp->intdata & MUST_VERIFY) != 0) {
00147         struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
00148         // XXX - probably should check for message origin BEFORE verify
00149         res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(final_comp, final_size, &pco, NULL);
00150         if (res < 0) {
00151             ccnr_debug_ccnb(ccnr, __LINE__, "co_parse_failed", NULL,
00152                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00153             goto Bail;
00154         }
00155         res = ccn_verify_content(info->h, final_comp, &pco);
00156         if (res != 0) {
00157             ccnr_debug_ccnb(ccnr, __LINE__, "co_verify_failed", NULL,
00158                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00159             goto Bail;
00160         }
00161     }
00162     switch (selfp->intdata & OPER_MASK) {
00163         case OP_SERVICE:
00164             if (ccnr->service_ccnb == NULL)
00165                 ccnr->service_ccnb = ccnr_init_service_ccnb(ccnr, info->h, CCNRID_LOCAL_URI, 600);
00166             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
00167                     ccnr->service_ccnb->buf,
00168                     ccnr->service_ccnb->length,
00169                     1,
00170                     NULL,
00171                     info->interest_ccnb,
00172                     info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00173                     info->pi
00174                 )) {
00175                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnr->service_ccnb->buf,
00176                                  ccnr->service_ccnb->length);
00177                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00178                 goto Finish;
00179             }
00180             // XXX this needs refactoring.
00181             if (ccnr->neighbor_ccnb == NULL)
00182                 ccnr->neighbor_ccnb = ccnr_init_service_ccnb(ccnr, info->h, CCNRID_NEIGHBOR_URI, 5);
00183             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
00184                     ccnr->neighbor_ccnb->buf,
00185                     ccnr->neighbor_ccnb->length,
00186                     1,
00187                     NULL,
00188                     info->interest_ccnb,
00189                     info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00190                     info->pi
00191                 )) {
00192                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnr->neighbor_ccnb->buf,
00193                                  ccnr->neighbor_ccnb->length);
00194                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00195                 goto Finish;
00196             }
00197             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
00198                                              ccnr->policy_link_cob->buf,
00199                                              ccnr->policy_link_cob->length,
00200                                              1,
00201                                              NULL,
00202                                              info->interest_ccnb,
00203                                              info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00204                                              info->pi
00205                                              )) {
00206                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnr->policy_link_cob->buf,
00207                         ccnr->policy_link_cob->length);
00208                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00209                 goto Finish;
00210             }
00211             goto Bail;
00212             break;
00213         default:
00214             // No other OP_xxx are supported here
00215             goto Bail;
00216     }
00217 Bail:
00218     res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR;
00219 Finish:
00220     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
00221     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00222     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keylocator);
00223     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&reply_body);
00224     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
00225     return(res);
00226 }
00227 
00228 static int
00229 ccnr_internal_client_refresh(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00230                void *clienth,
00231                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00232                int flags)
00233 {
00234     struct ccnr_handle *ccnr = clienth;
00235     int microsec = 0;
00236     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
00237           ccnr->internal_client != NULL &&
00238           ccnr->internal_client_refresh == ev) {
00239         microsec = ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnr->internal_client);
00240         if (microsec > ev->evint)
00241             microsec = ev->evint;
00242     }
00243     if (microsec <= 0 && ccnr->internal_client_refresh == ev)
00244         ccnr->internal_client_refresh = NULL;
00245     return(microsec);
00246 }
00247 
00248 #define CCNR_ID_TEMPL "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
00249 
00250 PUBLIC void
00251 ccnr_uri_listen(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr, struct ccn *ccn, const char *uri,
00252                 ccn_handler p, intptr_t intdata)
00253 {
00254     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
00255     struct ccn_charbuf *uri_modified = NULL;
00256     struct ccn_closure *closure;
00257     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps;
00258     const unsigned char *comp;
00259     size_t comp_size;
00260     size_t offset;
00261     
00262     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00263     ccn_name_from_uri(name, uri);
00264     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00265     if (ccn_name_split(name, comps) < 0)
00266         abort();
00267     if (ccn_name_comp_get(name->buf, comps, 1, &comp, &comp_size) >= 0) {
00268         if (comp_size == 32 && 0 == memcmp(comp, CCNR_ID_TEMPL, 32)) {
00269             /* Replace placeholder with our ccnr_id */
00270             offset = comp - name->buf;
00271             memcpy(name->buf + offset, ccnr->ccnr_id, 32);
00272             uri_modified = ccn_charbuf_create();
00273             ccn_uri_append(uri_modified, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00274             uri = (char *)uri_modified->buf;
00275         }
00276     }
00277     closure = calloc(1, sizeof(*closure));
00278     closure->p = p;
00279     closure->data = ccnr;
00280     closure->intdata = intdata;
00281     ccn_set_interest_filter(ccn, name, closure);
00282     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00283     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri_modified);
00284     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
00285 }
00286 
00287 /*
00288  * This is used to shroud the contents of the keystore, which mainly serves
00289  * to add integrity checking and defense against accidental misuse.
00290  * The file permissions serve for restricting access to the private keys.
00291  */
00292 #ifndef CCNR_KEYSTORE_PASS
00293 #define CCNR_KEYSTORE_PASS "Th1s 1s n0t 8 g00d R3p0s1t0ry p8ssw0rd!"
00294 #endif
00295 
00296 /**
00297  *  Create the repository keystore if necessary,
00298  *  and load it into the client handle h.
00299  *
00300  *  It is permitted for h to be NULL to skip the load.
00301  *  @returns -1 if there were problems.
00302  */
00303  
00304 int
00305 ccnr_init_repo_keystore(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr, struct ccn *h)
00306 {
00307     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
00308     struct ccn_charbuf *culprit = NULL;
00309     struct stat statbuf;
00310     int res = -1;
00311     char *keystore_path = NULL;
00312     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00313     
00314     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00315     culprit = temp;
00316     ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "%s/", ccnr->directory);
00317     res = stat(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), &statbuf);
00318     if (res == -1)
00319         goto Finish;
00320     if ((statbuf.st_mode & S_IFDIR) == 0) {
00321         res = -1;
00322         errno = ENOTDIR;
00323         goto Finish;
00324     }
00325     ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "ccnx_repository_keystore");
00326     keystore_path = strdup(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp));
00327     res = stat(keystore_path, &statbuf);
00328     
00329     if (res == 0 && h != NULL)
00330         res = ccn_load_default_key(h, keystore_path, CCNR_KEYSTORE_PASS);
00331     if (res >= 0) {
00332         culprit = NULL;
00333         goto Finish;
00334     }
00335     /* No stored keystore that we can access. Create one if we can.*/
00336     res = ccn_keystore_file_init(keystore_path, CCNR_KEYSTORE_PASS, "Repository", 0, 0);
00337     if (res != 0) {
00338         res = -1;
00339         goto Finish;
00340     }
00341     if (CCNSHOULDLOG(ccnr, keystore, CCNL_WARNING))
00342         ccnr_msg(ccnr, "New repository private key saved in %s", keystore_path);
00343     if (h != NULL)
00344         res = ccn_load_default_key(h, keystore_path, CCNR_KEYSTORE_PASS);
00345 Finish:
00346     if (res >= 0 && h != NULL)
00347         res = ccn_chk_signing_params(h, NULL, &sp, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00348     if (res >= 0 && h != NULL) {
00349         memcpy(ccnr->ccnr_id, sp.pubid, sizeof(ccnr->ccnr_id));
00350         if (ccnr->ccnr_keyid == NULL)
00351             ccnr->ccnr_keyid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00352         else
00353             ccnr->ccnr_keyid->length = 0;
00354         ccn_charbuf_append_value(ccnr->ccnr_keyid, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00355         ccn_charbuf_append_string(ccnr->ccnr_keyid, ".M.K");
00356         ccn_charbuf_append_value(ccnr->ccnr_keyid, 0, 1);
00357         ccn_charbuf_append(ccnr->ccnr_keyid, ccnr->ccnr_id, sizeof(ccnr->ccnr_id));
00358     }
00359     if (res < 0) {
00360         ccnr->running = -1; /* Make note of init failure */
00361         if (culprit != NULL)
00362             ccnr_msg(ccnr, "Error accessing keystore - %s: %s\n",
00363                      strerror(errno), ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp));
00364     }
00365     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
00366     if (keystore_path != NULL)
00367         free(keystore_path);
00368     return(res);
00369 }
00370 
00371 static int
00372 post_face_notice(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr, unsigned filedesc)
00373 {
00374     struct fdholder *fdholder = ccnr_r_io_fdholder_from_fd(ccnr, filedesc);
00375     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = ccn_charbuf_create();
00376     int res = -1;
00377     int port;
00378     
00379     // XXX - text version for trying out stream stuff - replace with ccnb
00380     if (fdholder == NULL)
00381         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "destroyface(%u);\n", filedesc);
00382     else {
00383         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "newface(%u, 0x%x", filedesc, fdholder->flags);
00384         if (fdholder->name->length != 0 &&
00385             (fdholder->flags & (CCNR_FACE_INET | CCNR_FACE_INET6)) != 0) {
00386             ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ", ");
00387             port = ccn_charbuf_append_sockaddr(msg, (struct sockaddr *)fdholder->name->buf);
00388             if (port < 0)
00389                 msg->length--;
00390             else if (port > 0)
00391                 ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ":%d", port);
00392         }
00393         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ");\n", filedesc);
00394     }
00395     res = ccn_seqw_write(ccnr->notice, msg->buf, msg->length);
00396     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
00397     return(res);
00398 }
00399 
00400 static int
00401 ccnr_notice_push(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00402                void *clienth,
00403                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00404                int flags)
00405 {
00406     struct ccnr_handle *ccnr = clienth;
00407     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = NULL;
00408     int i = 0;
00409     int j = 0;
00410     int microsec = 0;
00411     int res = 0;
00412     
00413     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
00414             ccnr->notice != NULL &&
00415             ccnr->notice_push == ev &&
00416             ccnr->chface != NULL) {
00417         chface = ccnr->chface;
00418         ccn_seqw_batch_start(ccnr->notice);
00419         for (i = 0; i < chface->n && res != -1; i++)
00420             res = post_face_notice(ccnr, chface->buf[i]);
00421         ccn_seqw_batch_end(ccnr->notice);
00422         for (j = 0; i < chface->n; i++, j++)
00423             chface->buf[j] = chface->buf[i];
00424         chface->n = j;
00425         if (res == -1)
00426             microsec = 3000;
00427     }
00428     if (microsec <= 0)
00429         ccnr->notice_push = NULL;
00430     return(microsec);
00431 }
00432 
00433 /**
00434  * Called by ccnr when a fdholder undergoes a substantive status change that
00435  * should be reported to interested parties.
00436  *
00437  * In the destroy case, this is called from the hash table finalizer,
00438  * so it shouldn't do much directly.  Inspecting the fdholder is OK, though.
00439  */
00440 void
00441 ccnr_face_status_change(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr, unsigned filedesc)
00442 {
00443     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = ccnr->chface;
00444     if (chface != NULL) {
00445         ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(chface, filedesc);
00446         if (ccnr->notice_push == NULL)
00447             ccnr->notice_push = ccn_schedule_event(ccnr->sched, 2000,
00448                                                    ccnr_notice_push,
00449                                                    NULL, 0);
00450     }
00451 }
00452 
00453 int
00454 ccnr_internal_client_start(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr)
00455 {
00456     if (ccnr->internal_client != NULL)
00457         return(-1);
00458     if (ccnr->face0 == NULL)
00459         abort();
00460     ccnr->internal_client = ccn_create();
00461     if (ccnr_init_repo_keystore(ccnr, ccnr->internal_client) < 0) {
00462         ccn_destroy(&ccnr->internal_client);
00463         return(-1);
00464     }
00465     ccnr->internal_client_refresh = ccn_schedule_event(ccnr->sched, 50000,
00466                          ccnr_internal_client_refresh,
00467                          NULL, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
00468     return(0);
00469 }
00470 
00471 void
00472 ccnr_internal_client_stop(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr)
00473 {
00474     ccnr->notice = NULL; /* ccn_destroy will free */
00475     if (ccnr->notice_push != NULL)
00476         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnr->sched, ccnr->notice_push);
00477     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnr->chface);
00478     ccn_destroy(&ccnr->internal_client);
00479     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnr->service_ccnb);
00480     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnr->neighbor_ccnb);
00481     if (ccnr->internal_client_refresh != NULL)
00482         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnr->sched, ccnr->internal_client_refresh);
00483 }

00486 // If we keep multiple internal handles around, this will need refactoring.

00488 
00489 static int
00490 ccnr_direct_client_refresh(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00491                void *clienth,
00492                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00493                int flags)
00494 {
00495     struct ccnr_handle *ccnr = clienth;
00496     int microsec = 0;
00497     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
00498           ccnr->direct_client != NULL &&
00499           ccnr->direct_client_refresh == ev) {
00500         microsec = ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnr->direct_client);
00501         // XXX - This is not really right, since an incoming request can cause us to need to reschedule this event.
00502         if CCNSHOULDLOG(ccnr, refresh, CCNL_FINEST)
00503             ccnr_msg(ccnr, "direct_client_refresh %d in %d usec",
00504                      ccn_get_connection_fd(ccnr->direct_client), microsec);
00505         if (microsec > ev->evint)
00506             microsec = ev->evint;
00507         if (microsec == 0)
00508             microsec = CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC;
00509     }
00510     if (microsec <= 0 && ccnr->direct_client_refresh == ev)
00511         ccnr->direct_client_refresh = NULL;
00512     return(microsec);
00513 }
00514 
00515 int
00516 ccnr_direct_client_start(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr)
00517 {
00518     ccnr->direct_client = ccn_create();
00519     if (ccnr_init_repo_keystore(ccnr, ccnr->direct_client) < 0) {
00520         ccn_destroy(&ccnr->direct_client);
00521         return(-1);
00522     }
00523     ccnr->direct_client_refresh = ccn_schedule_event(ccnr->sched, 50000,
00524                          ccnr_direct_client_refresh,
00525                          NULL, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
00526     return(0);
00527 }
00528 
00529 void
00530 ccnr_direct_client_stop(struct ccnr_handle *ccnr)
00531 {
00532     if (ccnr->notice_push != NULL)
00533         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnr->sched, ccnr->notice_push);
00534     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnr->chface);
00535     ccn_destroy(&ccnr->direct_client);
00536     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnr->service_ccnb);
00537     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnr->neighbor_ccnb);
00538     if (ccnr->direct_client_refresh != NULL)
00539         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnr->sched, ccnr->direct_client_refresh);
00540 }
